# Clay & Noj demo: data visualization


::: {.sourceClojure}
```clojure
(ns index
  (:require [scicloj.metamorph.ml.toydata
             :as toydata]
            [scicloj.noj.v1.vis.hanami
             :as hanami]
            [scicloj.kindly.v4.kind
             :as kind]))
```
:::



::: {.sourceClojure}
```clojure
(kind/video {:youtube-id "X_SsjhmG5Ok"})
```
:::

